about.heading: 👋 Hey, I'm Vivek Sorathiya ‚Äì an Android, Flutter & Web Developer!
about.description:
🚀 I specialize in building high-performance, fast, and scalable mobile & web applications that offer seamless user experiences. With 4+ years of expertise, I craft Flutter, Android (Kotlin/Java), and Web-based solutions that run flawlessly across platforms.

💡 I thrive on solving complex challenges, optimizing app performance, and turning ideas into reality with clean, efficient, and scalable code. Whether you're a startup, business, or enterprise, I‚Äôm all about delivering top-notch digital solutions that make a real impact.

🔥 Let's create something amazing together! 🚀

projects.title: SpeechNote - Speech to Text
projects.description: A powerful speech-to-text app that converts your voice into notes effortlessly. Available now on Google Play!

projects.title: Digital Post - Festival & Business Posters
projects.description: Create stunning festival and business posters with ease! Digital Post offers a wide range of customizable templates to promote your brand effortlessly. Available now on Google Play!

projects.title: Pocket Legal - Smart Legal Solutions
projects.description: A powerful web application designed to simplify legal document management and consultation services. Built with a user-friendly interface, Pocket Legal helps individuals and small businesses access legal resources, templates, and expert advice effortlessly.

projects.title: WowGeni Shop - Smart Shopping Experience
projects.description: WowGeni Shop is your go-to app for seamless online shopping! Discover a wide range of products, enjoy exclusive deals, and experience a smooth, hassle-free shopping journey with a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Tradexic - Smart Trading & Investment
projects.description: Tradexic is a powerful platform designed for traders and investors. Get real-time market insights, track your investments, and make smarter financial decisions with ease. Experience seamless trading at your fingertips!

projects.title: Ohho Delivery - Fast & Reliable
projects.description: Ohho Delivery is your ultimate solution for quick and hassle-free deliveries. From food to essentials, get everything delivered to your doorstep with real-time tracking and seamless ordering.

projects.title: Zois - Smart & Secure Connections
projects.description: Zois is an innovative platform designed to streamline secure communication and connectivity. Experience seamless interactions with advanced features tailored for efficiency and convenience.

projects.title: Honest11 - Ultimate Gaming Experience
projects.description: Honest11 is a premier gaming platform offering exciting contests and rewards. Enjoy a seamless, fair, and thrilling gaming experience with top-notch features and secure transactions.
